Basic Protection
Plan A: Employees' compensation coverage for all domestic helpers including part-timers

Plans B & C: Comprehensive protection for overseas domestic helpers, not applicable to local helpers (Period of Insurance for selection: 1-year or 2-year).
Employer's liability up to HK$100,000,000

Loss of service cash allowances
